ToolTipText:
• Enhanced - 12 (24x7) offers 12 hours restoration time for nbn faults when the ticket is raised with nbn
  • Enhanced - 4 (24x7) offers 4 hours restoration time for nbn faults when the ticket is raised with nbn
  • Standard SLA offers next business day restoration time for nbn faults when the ticket is raised with nbn

PIN must not contain;
  • Consecutive numbers in either an upward or downward order. E.g. 1234, 2345, 9876, 4321.
  • The same number repeated. E.g. 0000, 1111, 2222 through to 9999.
  • Any combination of the customer's birthdate.
  • Postcode of the customer's listed home or billing account addresses.
  • Phone keypad patterns E.g. 1379, 2468, 1397, 2684, 1793, 2580

PIN must not contain;
  • Consecutive numbers in either an upward or downward order. E.g. 1234, 2345, 9876, 4321.
  • The same number repeated. E.g. 0000, 1111, 2222 through to 9999.
  • Any combination of the customer's birthdate.
  • Postcode of the customer's listed home or billing account addresses.
  • Phone keypad patterns E.g. 1379, 2468, 1397, 2684, 1793, 2580

PIN must not contain;
  • Consecutive numbers in either an upward or downward order. E.g. 1234, 2345, 9876, 4321.
  • The same number repeated. E.g. 0000, 1111, 2222 through to 9999.

Expand this field to view all the Entitlement products on the service.
Use the Reset button to return the Credit Check Status to New so you can submit a new Credit Check

• For Sole Trader accounts you must enter an 11 digit ABN.
  • For LRC and Corporate accounts you must enter a 9 digit ACN.
  • To search, enter ABN/ACN and click 'Validate ABN/ACN' button
  • Invalid ABN/ACN will not display any results
New Customer DOM will be set to next available during order submission if DOM not altered

• For Sole Trader accounts you must enter an 11 digit ABN.
  • For LRC and Corporate accounts you must enter a 9 digit ACN.
  • To search, enter ABN/ACN and click 'Validate ABN/ACN' button
  • Invalid ABN/ACN will not display any results

Contact Number must be
  • 11 characters long.
  • Contact Number must be starting with digits 612, 613, 614, 617 or 618.

Reason Guidelines
Reason Guideline
Bill copyBill_copy (When waiving copy of invoice up to $2.20 - Vodafone Error only).
Data Add On dispute creditOne-Off - Adjust the fee for an existing data pack when customer disputes data pack charges
IDD Add On dispute creditOne off - adjust the fee for an existing IDD pack when a customer disputes IDD pack charges
Re rate incorrect plan chargesIncorrect plan was selected or if customer has been mis-informed about the plan inclusions (Re Rate)
Incorrect plan charges (NBN)Incorrect plan was selected or if customer has been mis-informed about the plan inclusions (Re Rate)
Insurance PremiumFor insurance charges (only after following the relevant credit guidelines)
Late Payment FeeWhen customer is disputing a Late Payment Fee, a credit for the charge can be given reactively, ensuring - max twice per 12month period, Not overdue & Direct Debit is active.
Early Exit FeeWhen customer was misinformed or not advised of an EEF Charge, and the disputed amount is less then $200 (VF Error Only)
Service not disconnectedWhen customer requested disconnection (validated in activities) but it wasn’t processed. Re rate to the date customer requested disconnection. (VF Error Only)
Number changeMSISDN fee waiver (only after following the relevant credit guidelines)
Accessories ReinstatedWhere a credit is required to offset a previous APP lump sum amount to resume a APP
MPP ReinstatedMPP One-Off Adjustment: To credit the MPP payout when reactivating a cancelled MPP

Reason Guidelines
Reason Guideline
Accessories Returned/Not sentAPP Removal: To credit the APP payout on a returned accessory (with no new APP to be created)
Early Exit FeeWhen customer was misinformed or not advised of an EEF Charge, and the disputed amount is less then $200 (VF Error Only)
MPP Returned or never sentMPP Removal: To credit the MPP payout on a returned device (with no new MPP to be created)
Number changeMSISDN fee waiver (only after following the relevant credit guidelines)

Reason Guidelines
Reason Guideline
Confirmed coverage issueCustomer faces confirmed issues with the network

Reason Guidelines
Reason Guideline
Roaming - $5 not activatedEligible plan for $5 roaming but not oped in when roaming was activated
Roam - Legacy plan no $5 packIf charges are for eligible $5 roaming countries RPC to equivalent in market plan and re-rate usage
Roaming - UAE Re RateNegotiate a re rate up to $5 per day (UAE ONLY) - Store Manager Approval Required
Data - Auto Booster chargesExcess data charges for customers on current in market plans (including any plan getting $10 boosters)
Calls - Overage on Legacy planExcess call charges on legacy (plans prior to $10 auto boosters)
Carrier billing chargesIf the customer has not received a credit for the same issue previously (in the past 12 months) and has been declined a refund from the partner for a dispute less than $30, you may offer a credit.
Legacy plan – Data ChargesExcess data charges on legacy (plans prior to $10 auto boosters)
Data Charges - Delayed alertsThis code is used in case of an excess data charge with delayed alerts
IDD Call Charge In Market planExcess IDD charges in excluded countries
IDD Calls on Legacy planExcess IDD charges on legacy (plans prior to $10 auto boosters)
TXT Charges on Legacy PlanExcess messaging charges on legacy (plans prior to $10 auto boosters) - not including PSMS
Premium TXT- chargePremium TXT charges dispute
